attributes.action: Start a petition that everyone can add to with their signature
attributes.additional_details: highly modified cars  at car street meets are doing wheel spins and drifting around roundabouts and on main roads as can be seen on you tube video's highly modified cars don't belong on the streets but on a race tracks
attributes.background: Ban high modified car street meets, make them illegal, seize any car breaking the law and have it taken away and crushed

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already illegal to drive dangerously or fail to follow traffic laws. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
